A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was terrible. Like all of JJ Abrams recent films it was pretty and shiny but lacked memorable characters\, storylines\, dialogue and depth. I could make a movie twice as good with half the money and I've never studied film.  When this movie comes on TV in a few years time you won't care to watch it. A jumbled mess made out of a dumpster fire of childhood memories and ham-fisted attempts at audience emotional manipulation. One star for Luke Skywalker and that's about it.
